name: Destruction Of World: Delux
description:
Destruction Of World: Physical Sandbox is a physics-based puzzle game. The player finds himself in a situation where he needs to build a mechanism in order to complete the unique task of each level. To do this, he was provided with a number of unique mechanisms with which it is possible to build almost anything.
The game has two modes:
- Levels that require meeting conditions, surviving, destroying, extracting ore and much more.
- Sandbox, here the player is not limited by anything, build whatever your heart desires, check the physics of the real world.
Delux version - 500 coins for opening mechanisms blueprints, no advertising
